php.LBL_ADD_FILTER_DESC: Only filters with the "list in metrics" option enabled are available.
php.LBL_ADD_CHART_FILTER_DESC: Only filters with the "list in metrics" option enabled are available.
php.LBL_CLEAR_DEVICE_CONF: Clear configuration of widgets for this device
php.LBL_CLEAR_DEVICE_CONF_DESC: The button removes/resets the configuration only for the device you are currently using and only for the current tab.
